tool_description: This API allows you to generate QR codes from a provided URL or text content. You can customize the appearance of the QR code by specifying options such as margin, background color, and foreground color. The API accepts both GET and POST requests.
name: Qrcode Generator
title: Qrcode Generator

api_list.name: Create Qrcode with custom content and colour
api_list.description: Create QR codes with the given content and color.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qrcode-generator22.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qrcode-generator22.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://qrcode-generator22.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qrcode-generator22.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
